Nom: Patrick Yoba. Prénom: Patrick. Titre: Data Analyst. Email: patrick@email.com. Téléphone: +33 6 12 34 56 78. Adresse: Paris, France. Expérience: Data Analyst chez ABC (Paris) de 2022 à 2024. Tâches: analyse des ventes; création de dashboards; automatisation du reporting. Compétences techniques: Python, SQL. Outils: Power BI, Excel. Liens: LinkedIn https://linkedin.com/in/patrickyoba

{"informations":{"prenom":"Patrick","nom":"Yoba","titre":"Data Analyst","email":"patrick@email.com","telephone":"+33 6 12 34 56 78","adresse":"Paris, France","liens":["https://linkedin.com/in/patrickyoba"]},"resume":null,"competences":{"techniques":["Python","SQL"],"outils":["Excel","Power BI"]},"experience":[{"company":"ABC","role":"Data Analyst","date_debut":"2022","date_fin":"2024","taches":["Analyse des ventes.","Création de dashboards.","Automatisation du reporting."]}],"education":[],"projets":[],"langues":[]}
